member.name: T:WpfKb.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard
member.summary: FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard

member.name: M:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.AreAnimationsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether animations are enabled.
member.value: true if animations are enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.IsAllowedToFade
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Keyboard is allowed to fade. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.IsDragging
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the keyboard is currently being dragged. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.IsDragHelperAllowedToHide
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the drag helper text is allowed to hide. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.IsKeyboardShown
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates that the keyboard is shown (not faded). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.MaximumKeyboardOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum opacity for a fully displayed keyboard. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.MinimumKeyboardOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity to use for a partially hidden keyboard. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.KeyboardHideDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to wait after the last keyboard activity before hiding the keyboard. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.KeyboardHideAnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration in seconds for the keyboard hide animation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.KeyboardShowAnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration in seconds for the keyboard show animation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WpfKb.Controls.FloatingTouchScreenKeyboard.DeadZone
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum opacity for a fully displayed keyboard. This is a dependency property.
